messages.title: RE-ELECT ANDY SLAUGHTER
messages.content: I'm Andy Slaughter, Labour candidate for Hammersmith. I have worked hard for people in Shepherds Bush, Hammersmith and Fulham for over 30 years. Re-elect me if you want a public vote on Brexit and to remain in the EU. Together, we saved Charing Cross Hospital. Now, after 10 years of Conservative austerity, we need to invest in our NHS, schools and police. We must build more affordable homes. We must make the UK carbon neutral by 2030. Only Labour can stop the Conservatives in Hammersmith. Vote for me on 12 December.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Re-elect me if you want a public vote on Brexit and to remain in the EU.
Together, we saved Charing Cross Hospital. Now, after 10 years of Conservative austerity, we need to invest in our NHS.
We must build more affordable homes.
We must make the UK carbon neutral by 2030.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Two years ago, the Lib Dems won only 5% of the vote in Hammersmith, the Greens less than 2%. Only Labour can stop the Conservatives in Hammersmith.

issues.brexitEurope: Public vote on Brexit and to remain in the EU.
issues.environment: We must make the UK carbon neutral by 2030.
issues.health: Together, we saved Charing Cross Hospital. Now, after 10 years of Conservative austerity, we need to invest in our NHS.

community.content: We must build more affordable homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm Andy Slaughter, Labour candidate for Hammersmith. I have worked hard for people in Shepherds Bush, Hammersmith and Fulham for over 30 years.

examples: 97% of our schools have had their funding cut since 2015

A Brexit deal that will leave us £70 billion poorer
